page.title: 20Acknowledgments.
page.content: Our thanks to Mrs Wharton, Mrs Guyler and Mr and Mrs Hallihan for their help with our land-cover surveys.Thanks also to P.C.Caddick for his help with our work on Law and Order,to Mr John Bennett for his Local Government,to Mrs E.Griffiths for her talk on games and local legends and to all the local people for their co-operation with our questionnaires. The authors:The children of Class 2, {Stiperstones C. of E. Primary School. Timothy Bradley(11) Julie Perkins(11) James Richardson(11) Carla Holz(11) Michael Hampson(10) Julie Potter(11) Shaun Guyler(10) Marie Jones(11) Matthew Weeks(9) Stuart Trow(9) Lindsey Wharton(9) Ian Groves(9) Elaine Cadwallader(10)Sally Davies(10) Piers Hallihan(9) Christian Crawford. Mr.G.C.Smith, their class teacher and headmaster.
